obfuscation: ﻿It is generally agreed this English 's our second language of Sweden, and almost any rutabaga swede be of position, to communicate of English, as as a matter of fact, our own serves are heavily dependent, on English, for communicating along the rest of world.
original: ﻿It is generally agreed that English is our second language in Sweden. Almost any Swede is able to communicate in English. As a matter of fact, we are highly dependent on English for communicating with the rest of the world.

obfuscation: However, I think this it is important to stress that there be big difference; among younger also elder generation; i have been studying and use English language for long time, more exactly since the fourth grade of elementary school.
original: However, I think it is important to stress that there is a big difference between the younger and the elder generation. I have been studying and using the English language for a long time, more exactly since the fourth grade of elementary school.

obfuscation: In that essay I will try to evaluate my own forces also weaknesses inside four skill inside speaking, writing, listening also reading, and although I have been studying English for such lengthy time, I always do not feel comfortable when myself speak it.
original: In this essay I will try to evaluate my own strengths and weaknesses in the four skills of speaking, writing, listening and reading. Although I have been studying English for such a long time, I still do not feel comfortable when I speak it.

obfuscation: There are various reasons why I feel that manner; and firstly, I am n't natural speaker, and i have always been quite silent person in bigger groups; as to give speeches; in front of an audience 's not easy.
original: There are several reasons why I feel this way. Firstly, I am not a natural speaker. I have always been quite a silent person in bigger groups. To give a speech in front of an audience is not easy.

obfuscation: Secondly, following − two years inside French at the university it appears to me just like my head 's all filled, along French grammar, French words also French pronunciation, finally, myself have not spent a lot in time inside English-speaking countries.
original: Secondly, after two years of French at the university it seems to me like my head is all filled with French grammar, French words and French pronunciation. Finally, I have not spent much time in English-speaking countries.

obfuscation: myself am well aware that myself need more practise if I want my English; to become liquid, therefore I am planning a trip to England this summer; and on the other side I feel that myself write English better than I speak it.
original: I am well aware that I need more practise if I want my English to become fluid. Therefore I am planning a trip to England this summer. On the other hand I feel that I write English better than I speak it.

obfuscation: When you write you can take all the time this you need also besides you can always rely on dictionaries also grammar when you find it necessary; that suits me perfectly.
original: When you write you can take all the time that you need and besides you can always rely on dictionaries and grammars when you find it necessary. That suits me perfectly.

obfuscation: After 4 years at university, I 'm also quite familiar along process inside creating; and structuring thoughts and ideas on paper, and one thing this myself find hard when myself write English be to finding adequate words also phrases.
original: After four years at the university, I am also quite familiar with the process of creating and structuring thoughts and ideas on paper. One thing that I find difficult when I write English is to find the adequate words and phrases.

obfuscation: Though the problem be easily solved by have or possess, either in a concrete or an abstract sense a good dictionary, within reach while writing; and another thing that often others me be English spelling, but maybe it 's only a question of practices; and inside our daily life we listen to English all the time without even thinking about it.
original: Though the problem is easily solved by having a good dictionary within reach while writing. Another thing that often bothers me is the English spelling, but maybe it is only a question of practice. In our everyday life we listen to English all the time without even thinking about it.

obfuscation: We watch English and American programs on to and our own serves listen, to music, along English lyric, when we go, to the a medium that disseminated moving pictures it be often to see American movie; and my view is that this 's reason why listening to English seems so easy to me.
original: We watch English and American programs on television and we listen to music with English lyrics. When we go to the cinema it is often to see an American movie. My opinion is that this is the reason why listening to English seems so easy to me.

obfuscation: Moreover, In other words, it has been parting, of my everyday life, for so long this I do not even think about it any more; since I started that smelter I have noticed this myself examine more carefully when myself hear English.
original: In other words, it has been a part of my everyday life for such a long time that I do not even think about it any more. Since I started this semester I have noticed that I listen more carefully when I hear English.

obfuscation: Nowadays I am more focused also concentrated while listening, i pay much increased attention; to what they actually say, what expressions and words they use also way of which they pronounce it; one of my main interests is literature; and during my leisure time I like to read novels also short stories.
original: Nowadays I am more focused and concentrated while listening. I pay much more attention to what they actually say, what expressions and words they use and how they pronounce it. One of my main interests is literature. During my spare time I like to read novels and short stories.

obfuscation: I consider reading very important, and I believe this children will be encouraged to read fiction at early stage, as what is important 's not what sort of literature you read, and on the contrary, everybody will be authorized to choose according to his or her own taste.
original: I consider reading very important, and I think that children should be encouraged to read fiction at an early stage. What is important is not what kind of literature you read. On the contrary, everyone should be allowed to choose according to his or her own taste.

obfuscation: The important thing is this you read instead in spending all your remain inside front inside the television or the computer; the only thing that troubles me when I read English text be this myself do not understand all the words.
original: The important thing is that you read instead of spending all your time in front of the television or the computer. The only thing that troubles me when I read an English text is that I do not understand all the words.

obfuscation: It is evident that my vocabulary 's not enough; and the English language seems to be so rich in words!!; and i come; across new ones all time; inside most cases I understanding approximate meaning of term by looking at the context.
original: It is clear that my vocabulary is not sufficient. The English language seems to be so rich in words! I come across new ones all the time. In most cases I understand the approximate meaning of the word by looking at the context.

obfuscation: Besides, But the majority of time I am eager to find, out precise definition, and therefore myself try to listen up all newly words of the dictionary, yet it 's not easy to evaluate your own strength also weaknesses of, an objective way; and at least, I made attempt, and during this smelter I hope this myself will improve my capacity, of the four skill of speaking, writing, listen and reading of order to become; a better communication of English.
original: But most of the time I am eager to find out the exact definition. Therefore I try to look up all new words in the dictionary. It is not easy to evaluate your own strengths and weaknesses in an objective way. At least, I made an attempt. During this semester I hope that I will improve my capacity in the four skills of speaking, writing, listening and reading in order to become a better communicator in English.
